020package org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal;
021
022import static java.util.Collections.reverse;
023import static java.util.function.Function.identity;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.DEPRECATED;
025import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
026import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.checkState;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.isNull;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireValidArgument;
034
035import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
036import javax.lang.model.element.PackageElement;
037import javax.lang.model.element.TypeElement;
038import javax.lang.model.util.SimpleElementVisitor14;
039import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
040import java.util.ArrayList;
041import java.util.List;
042import java.util.Map;
043import java.util.Optional;
044
045import org.apiguardian.api.API;
046import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
047import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.ValidationException;
048import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.AnnotationSpec;
049import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ClassName;
050
051/**
052 *  The implementation of
053 *  {@link ClassName}
054 *  for a fully-qualified class name for top-level and member classes.
055 *
056 *  @modified Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
057 *  @version $Id: ClassNameImpl.java 1062 2023-09-25 23:11:41Z tquadrat $
058 *  @since 0.0.5
059 *
060 *  @UMLGraph.link
061 */
062@SuppressWarnings( {"ClassWithTooManyFields", "ComparableImplementedButEqualsNotOverridden"} )
063@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ClassNameImpl.java 1062 2023-09-25 23:11:41Z tquadrat $" )
064@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
065public final class ClassNameImpl extends TypeNameImpl implements ClassName
066{
067        /*-----------*\
068    ====** Constants **========================================================
069        \*-----------*/
070    /**
071     *  The class name for
072     *  {@link Boolean}.
073     */
074    public static final ClassNameImpl BOXED_BOOLEAN = get( Boolean.class );
075
076    /**
077     *  The class name for
078     *  {@link Byte}.
079     */
080    public static final ClassNameImpl BOXED_BYTE = get( Byte.class );
081
082    /**
083     *  The class name for
084     *  {@link Character}.
085     */
086    public static final ClassNameImpl BOXED_CHAR = get( Character.class );
087
088    /**
089     *  The class name for
090     *  {@link Double}.
091     */
092    public static final ClassNameImpl BOXED_DOUBLE = get( Double.class );
093
094    /**
095     *  The class name for
096     *  {@link Float}.
097     */
098    public static final ClassNameImpl BOXED_FLOAT = get( Float.class );
099
100    /**
101     *  The class name for
102     *  {@link Integer}.
103     */
104    public static final ClassNameImpl BOXED_INT = get( Integer.class );
105
106    /**
107     *  The class name for
108     *  {@link Long}.
109     */
110    public static final ClassNameImpl BOXED_LONG = get( Long.class );
111
112    /**
113     *  The class name for
114     *  {@link Short}.
115     */
116    public static final ClassNameImpl BOXED_SHORT = get( Short.class );
117
118    /**
119     *  The class name for
120     *  {@link Void}.
121     */
122    public static final ClassNameImpl BOXED_VOID = get( Void.class );
123
124    /**
125     *  The class name for
126     *  {@link Object}.
127     */
128    public static final ClassNameImpl OBJECT = get( Object.class );
129
130        /*------------*\
131    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
132        \*------------*/
133    /**
134     *  The full class name like {@code java.util.Map.Entry}.
135     */
136    private final String m_CanonicalName;
137
138    /**
139     *  The enclosing class, or empty if this is not enclosed in another class.
140     */
141    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
142    private final Optional<ClassNameImpl> m_EnclosingClassName;
143
144    /**
145     * The package name of this class, or the empty String if this is in the
146     * default package.
147     */
148    private final String m_PackageName;
149
150    /**
151     *  The name for this class name, like {@code Entry} for
152     *  {@code java.util.Map.Entry}.
153     */
154    private final String m_SimpleName;
155
156        /*--------------*\
157    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
158        \*--------------*/
159    /**
160     *  Creates a new {@code ClassNameImpl} instance.
161     *
162     *  @param  packageName The name of the package for the new class name.
163     *  @param  enclosingClassName  The name of the enclosing class; can be
164     *      {@code null} in case of a top level class.
165     *  @param  simpleName  The name of the class.
166     */
167    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
168    public ClassNameImpl( final CharSequence packageName, final ClassNameImpl enclosingClassName, final CharSequence simpleName )
169    {
170        this( packageName, enclosingClassName, simpleName, List.of() );
171    }   //  ClassNameImpl()
172
173    /**
174     *  Creates a new {@code ClassNameImpl} instance.
175     *
176     *  @param  packageName The name of the package for the new class name.
177     *  @param  enclosingClassName  The name of the enclosing class; can be
178     *      empty in case of a top level class.
179     *  @param  simpleName  The name of the class.
180     */
181    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
182    public ClassNameImpl( final CharSequence packageName, final Optional<ClassNameImpl> enclosingClassName, final CharSequence simpleName )
183    {
184        this( packageName, enclosingClassName, simpleName, List.of() );
185    }   //  ClassNameImpl()
186
187    /**
188     *  Creates a new {@code ClassNameImpl} instance.
189     *
190     *  @param  packageName The name of the package for the new class name.
191     *  @param  enclosingClassName  The name of the enclosing class; can be
192     *      {@code null} in case of a top level class.
193     *  @param  simpleName  The name of the class.
194     *  @param  annotations The annotations for this class name.
195     */
196    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
197    public ClassNameImpl( final CharSequence packageName, final ClassNameImpl enclosingClassName, final CharSequence simpleName, final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> annotations )
198    {
199        this( packageName, Optional.ofNullable( enclosingClassName ), simpleName, annotations );
200    }   //  ClassNameImpl()
201
202    /**
203     *  Creates a new {@code ClassNameImpl} instance.
204     *
205     *  @param  packageName The name of the package for the new class name.
206     *  @param  enclosingClassName  The name of the enclosing class.
207     *  @param  simpleName  The name of the class.
208     *  @param  annotations The annotations for this class name.
209     */
210    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
211    public ClassNameImpl( final CharSequence packageName, final Optional<ClassNameImpl> enclosingClassName, final CharSequence simpleName, final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> annotations )
212    {
213        super( annotations );
214        m_PackageName = requireNonNullArgument( packageName, "packageName" ).toString().intern();
215        m_EnclosingClassName = requireNonNullArgument( enclosingClassName, "enclosingClassName" );
216        m_SimpleName = requireNotEmptyArgument( simpleName, "simpleName" ).toString().intern();
217        m_CanonicalName = enclosingClassName.map( className -> (className.m_CanonicalName + '.' + m_SimpleName) )
218            .orElseGet( () ->
219                m_PackageName.isEmpty()
220                ? m_SimpleName
221                : m_PackageName + '.' + m_SimpleName
222            );
223    }   //  ClassNameImpl()
224
225        /*---------*\
226    ====** Methods **==========================================================
227        \*---------*/
228    /**
229     *  {@inheritDoc}
230     */
231    @Override
232    public final ClassNameImpl annotated( final List<AnnotationSpec> annotations )
233    {
234        return new ClassNameImpl( m_PackageName, m_EnclosingClassName, m_SimpleName, concatAnnotations( annotations ) );
235    }   //  annotated()
236
237    /**
238     *  Returns a new {@code ClassName} instance for the given fully-qualified
239     *  class name string. This method assumes that the input is ASCII and
240     *  follows typical Java style (lowercase package names, UpperCamelCase
241     *  class names) and may produce incorrect results or throw
242     *  {@link IllegalArgumentException}
243     *  otherwise. For that reason,
244     *  {@link #get(Class)},
245     *  {@link #get(CharSequence,CharSequence,CharSequence...)},
246     *  and
247     *  {@link #get(TypeElement)}
248     *  should be preferred as they can correctly create {@code ClassName}
249     *  instances without such restrictions.
250     *
251     *  @param  className   The fully qualified class name.
252     *  @return The new class name instance.
253     *
254     *  @deprecated Because of the limitations described above, this method is
255     *      seen as inherently unsafe, and therefore it was decided to
256     *      deprecate it.
257     */
258    @Deprecated( since = "0.1.0" )
259    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
260    public static final ClassNameImpl bestGuess( final CharSequence className )
261    {
262        final var classNameString = requireNotEmptyArgument( className, "className" ).toString().intern();
263        /*
264         * Add the package name, like "java.util.concurrent", or "" for no
265         * package.
266         */
267        var pos = 0;
268        while( pos < classNameString.length() && Character.isLowerCase( classNameString.codePointAt( pos ) ) )
269        {
270            pos = classNameString.indexOf( '.', pos ) + 1;
271            checkState( pos != 0, () -> new ValidationException( "couldn't make a guess for %s".formatted( classNameString ) ) );
272        }
273        final var packageName = pos == 0 ? EMPTY_STRING : classNameString.substring( 0, pos - 1 );
274
275        //---* Add class names like "Map" and "Entry" *------------------------
276        ClassNameImpl retValue = null;
277        for( final var simpleName : classNameString.substring( pos ).split( "\\.", -1 ) )
278        {
279            checkState( !simpleName.isEmpty() && Character.isUpperCase( simpleName.codePointAt( 0 ) ), () -> new ValidationException(  "couldn't make a guess for %s".formatted( classNameString ) ) );
280            retValue = new ClassNameImpl( packageName, retValue, simpleName );
281        }
282
283        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
284        return retValue;
285    }   //  bestGuess()
286
287    /**
288     *  {@inheritDoc}
289     */
290    @Override
291    public final int compareTo( final ClassName o ) { return canonicalName().compareTo( o.canonicalName() ); }
292
293    /**
294     *  {@inheritDoc}
295     */
296    @Override
297    public final String canonicalName() { return m_CanonicalName; }
298
299    /**
300     *  {@inheritDoc}
301     */
302    @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
303    @Override
304    public final CodeWriter emit( final CodeWriter out ) throws UncheckedIOException
305    {
306        final var retValue = requireNonNullArgument( out, "out" );
307        var charsEmitted = false;
308        for( final var className : enclosingClasses() )
309        {
310            final String simpleName;
311            if( charsEmitted )
312            {
313                //---* An enclosing class was already emitted *----------------
314                retValue.emit( "." );
315                simpleName = className.m_SimpleName;
316
317            }
318            else if( className.isAnnotated() || className == this )
319            {
320                /*
321                 * We encountered the first enclosing class that must be
322                 * emitted.
323                 */
324                final var qualifiedName = retValue.lookupName( className );
325                final var dot = qualifiedName.lastIndexOf( '.' );
326                if( dot != -1 )
327                {
328                    retValue.emitAndIndent( qualifiedName.substring( 0, dot + 1 ) );
329                    simpleName = qualifiedName.substring( dot + 1 );
330                    charsEmitted = true;
331                }
332                else
333                {
334                    simpleName = qualifiedName;
335                }
336
337            }
338            else
339            {
340                /*
341                 * Don't emit this enclosing type. Keep going so we can be more
342                 * precise.
343                 */
344                continue;
345            }
346
347            if( className.isAnnotated() )
348            {
349                if( charsEmitted ) retValue.emit( " " );
350                className.emitAnnotations( retValue );
351            }
352
353            retValue.emit( simpleName );
354            charsEmitted = true;
355        }
356
357
358        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
359        return retValue;
360    }   //  emit()
361
362    /**
363     *  Returns all enclosing classes in {@code this}, outermost first.
364     *
365     *  @return The enclosing classes.
366     */
367    private final List<ClassNameImpl> enclosingClasses()
368    {
369        final List<ClassNameImpl> retValue = new ArrayList<>();
370        for( var currentClass = this; nonNull( currentClass ); currentClass = currentClass.m_EnclosingClassName.orElse( null ) )
371        {
372            retValue.add( currentClass );
373        }
374        reverse( retValue );
375
376        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
377        return retValue;
378    }   //  enclosingClasses()
379
380    /**
381     *  Returns the enclosing class, like {@link Map} for
382     *  {@code java.util.Map.Entry}. The return value will be
383     *  {@linkplain Optional#empty() empty}
384     *  if this class is not nested in another class.
385     *
386     *  @return An instance of
387     *      {@link Optional}
388     *      that holds the name of the enclosing class.
389     */
390    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
391    public final Optional<ClassNameImpl> enclosingClassName() { return m_EnclosingClassName; }
392
393    /**
394     *  Creates a new {@code ClassName} instance from an instance of
395     *  {@link Class}.
396     *
397     *  @param  sourceClass The instance of {@code java.lang.Class}.
398     *  @return The respective instance of {@code ClassName}.
399     */
400    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
401    public static final ClassNameImpl from( final Class<?> sourceClass )
402    {
403        var validatedClass = requireNonNullArgument( sourceClass, "sourceClass" );
404        requireValidArgument( validatedClass, "sourceClass", v -> !v.isPrimitive(), $ -> "primitive types cannot be represented as a ClassName" );
405        requireValidArgument( validatedClass, "sourceClass", v -> !void.class.equals( v ), $ -> "'void' type cannot be represented as a ClassName" );
406        requireValidArgument( validatedClass, "sourceClass", v -> !v.isArray(), $ -> "array types cannot be represented as a ClassName" );
407
408        final ClassNameImpl retValue;
409        var anonymousSuffix = EMPTY_STRING;
410        while( validatedClass.isAnonymousClass() )
411        {
412            final var lastDollar = validatedClass.getName().lastIndexOf( '$' );
413            //noinspection CallToStringConcatCanBeReplacedByOperator
414            anonymousSuffix = validatedClass.getName().substring( lastDollar ).concat( anonymousSuffix );
415            validatedClass = validatedClass.getEnclosingClass();
416        }
417        final var name = validatedClass.getSimpleName() + anonymousSuffix;
418
419        if( isNull( validatedClass.getEnclosingClass() ) )
420        {
421            /*
422             * Avoid unreliable Class.getPackage():
423             * https://github.com/square/javapoet/issues/295
424             */
425            final var lastDot = validatedClass.getName().lastIndexOf( '.' );
426            final var packageName = (lastDot < 0) ? null : validatedClass.getName().substring( 0, lastDot );
427            retValue = new ClassNameImpl( packageName, Optional.empty(), name );
428        }
429        else
430        {
431            retValue = get( validatedClass.getEnclosingClass() ).nestedClass( name );
432        }
433
434        // ---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
435        return retValue;
436    }   //  from()
437
438    /**
439     *  Returns the class name for the given
440     *  {@link TypeElement}
441     *  instance.
442     *
443     *  @param  element The type element instance.
444     *  @return The new class name instance.
445     */
446    @SuppressWarnings( {"AnonymousInnerClassWithTooManyMethods", "OverlyComplexAnonymousInnerClass"} )
447    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
448    public static final ClassNameImpl from( final TypeElement element )
449    {
450        final var simpleName = requireNonNullArgument( element, "element" ).getSimpleName().toString();
451
452        @SuppressWarnings( "AnonymousInnerClass" )
453        final var retValue = element.getEnclosingElement().accept( new SimpleElementVisitor14<ClassNameImpl,Void>()
454        {
455            /**
456             *  {@inheritDoc}
457             */
458            @Override
459            public final ClassNameImpl visitPackage( final PackageElement packageElement, final Void p )
460            {
461                return new ClassNameImpl( packageElement.getQualifiedName().toString(), Optional.empty(), simpleName );
462            }   //  visitPackage()
463
464            /**
465             *  {@inheritDoc}
466             */
467            @Override
468            public final ClassNameImpl visitType( final TypeElement enclosingClass, final Void p )
469            {
470                return from( enclosingClass ).nestedClass( simpleName );
471            }   //  visitType()
472
473            /**
474             *  {@inheritDoc}
475             */
476            @Override
477            public final ClassNameImpl visitUnknown( final Element unknown, final Void p )
478            {
479                return from( EMPTY_STRING, simpleName );
480            }   //  visitUnknown()
481
482            /**
483             *  {@inheritDoc}
484             */
485            @Override
486            public final ClassNameImpl defaultAction( final Element enclosingElement, final Void p )
487            {
488                throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Unexpected type nesting: " + element );
489            }   //  defaultAction()
490        }, null );
491
492        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
493        return retValue;
494    }   //  from()
495
496    /**
497     *  Returns a class name created from the given parts.<br>
498     *  <br>For example, calling this method with package name
499     *  {@code "java.util"} and simple names {@code "Map"} and {@code "Entry"}
500     *  yields {@code java.util.Map.Entry}.
501     *
502     *  @param  packageName The package name.
503     *  @param  simpleName  The name of the top-level class.
504     *  @param  simpleNames The names of the nested classes, from outer to
505     *      inner.
506     *  @return The new {@code ClassName} instance.
507     */
508    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
509    public static final ClassNameImpl from( final CharSequence packageName, final CharSequence simpleName, final CharSequence... simpleNames )
510    {
511        var retValue = new ClassNameImpl( packageName, Optional.empty(), simpleName );
512        for( final var name : simpleNames )
513        {
514            retValue = retValue.nestedClass( name );
515        }
516
517        // ---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
518        return retValue;
519    }   //  from()
520
521    /**
522     *  Creates a new {@code ClassName} instance from an instance of
523     *  {@link Class}.
524     *
525     *  @param  sourceClass The instance of {@code java.lang.Class}.
526     *  @return The respective instance of {@code ClassName}.
527     *
528     *  @deprecated Use
529     *      {@link #from(Class)}
530     *      instead.
531     */
532    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
533    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
534    public static final ClassNameImpl get( final Class<?> sourceClass ) { return from( sourceClass ); }
535
536    /**
537     *  Returns the class name for the given
538     *  {@link TypeElement}
539     *  instance.
540     *
541     *  @param  element The type element instance.
542     *  @return The new class name instance.
543     *
544     *  @deprecated Use
545     *      {@link #from(TypeElement)}
546     *      instead.
547     */
548    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
549    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
550    public static final ClassNameImpl get( final TypeElement element ) { return from( element ); }
551
552    /**
553     *  Returns a class name created from the given parts.<br>
554     *  <br>For example, calling this method with package name
555     *  {@code "java.util"} and simple names {@code "Map"} and {@code "Entry"}
556     *  yields {@code java.util.Map.Entry}.
557     *
558     *  @param  packageName The package name.
559     *  @param  simpleName  The name of the top-level class.
560     *  @param  simpleNames The names of the nested classes, from outer to
561     *      inner.
562     *  @return The new {@code ClassName} instance.
563     *
564     *  @deprecated Use
565     *      {@link #from(CharSequence, CharSequence, CharSequence...)}
566     *      instead.
567     */
568    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
569    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
570    public static final ClassNameImpl get( final CharSequence packageName, final CharSequence simpleName, final CharSequence... simpleNames )
571    {
572        final var retValue = from( packageName, simpleName, simpleNames );
573
574        // ---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
575        return retValue;
576    }   //  get()
577
578    /**
579     *  {@inheritDoc}
580     */
581    @Override
582    public final boolean isAnnotated()
583    {
584        final var retValue = super.isAnnotated() || (m_EnclosingClassName.isPresent() && m_EnclosingClassName.get().isAnnotated());
585
586        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
587        return retValue;
588    }   //  isAnnotated()
589
590    /**
591     *  {@inheritDoc}
592     */
593    @Override
594    public final ClassNameImpl nestedClass( final CharSequence name )
595    {
596        final var retValue = new ClassNameImpl( m_PackageName, this, requireNotEmptyArgument( name, "name" ) );
597
598        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
599        return retValue;
600    }   //  nestedClass()
601
602    /**
603     *  {@inheritDoc}
604     */
605    @Override
606    public final String packageName() { return m_PackageName; }
607
608    /**
609     *  {@inheritDoc}
610     */
611    @Override
612    public final Optional<ClassName> parentClass() { return m_EnclosingClassName.map( identity() ); }
613
614    /**
615     *  {@inheritDoc} If
616     *  this class is enclosed by another class, this is equivalent to
617     *  {@link #enclosingClassName()}.{@link Optional#get()}.{@link #nestedClass(CharSequence) nestedClass(name)}.
618     *  Otherwise, it is equivalent to
619     *  {@link #get(CharSequence,CharSequence,CharSequence...) get(packageName(),name)}.
620     */
621    @Override
622    public final ClassNameImpl peerClass( final CharSequence name )
623    {
624        final var retValue = new ClassNameImpl( m_PackageName, m_EnclosingClassName, requireNotEmptyArgument( name, "name" ) );
625
626        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
627        return retValue;
628    }   //   peerClass()
629
630    /**
631     *  {@inheritDoc}
632     */
633    @Override
634    public final String reflectionName()
635    {
636        final var retValue = m_EnclosingClassName.map( className -> className.reflectionName() + '$' + m_SimpleName )
637            .orElse( m_PackageName.isEmpty() ? m_SimpleName : m_PackageName + '.' + m_SimpleName );
638
639        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
640        return retValue;
641    }   //  reflectionName()
642
643    /**
644     *  {@inheritDoc}
645     */
646    @Override
647    public final String simpleName() { return m_SimpleName; }
648
649    /**
650     *  {@inheritDoc}
651     */
652    @Override
653    public final List<String> simpleNames()
654    {
655        final List<String> retValue = new ArrayList<>();
656        m_EnclosingClassName.ifPresent( className -> retValue.addAll( className.simpleNames() ) );
657        retValue.add( m_SimpleName );
658
659        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
660        return retValue;
661    }   //  simpleNames()
662
663    /**
664     *  {@inheritDoc} Equivalent to chained calls to
665     *  {@link #enclosingClassName()}
666     *  until the result's enclosing class is not present.
667     */
668    @Override
669    public final ClassNameImpl topLevelClassName()
670    {
671        final var retValue = m_EnclosingClassName.map( ClassNameImpl::topLevelClassName ).orElse( this );
672
673        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
674        return retValue;
675    }   //  topLevelClassName
676
677    /**
678     *  {@inheritDoc}
679     */
680    @Override
681    public final ClassNameImpl withoutAnnotations()
682    {
683        var retValue = this;
684        if( isAnnotated() )
685        {
686            final var resultEnclosingClassName = m_EnclosingClassName.map( ClassNameImpl::withoutAnnotations ).orElse( null );
687            retValue = new ClassNameImpl( m_PackageName, resultEnclosingClassName, m_SimpleName );
688        }
689
690        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
691        return retValue;
692    }   //  withoutAnnotations()
693}
694//  class ClassNameImpl
695
696/*
697 *  End of File
698 */
